citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:30 a.m. on
08/18/2015.
I arrived at the facility at approximately 10:30 a.m. and knocked on the door. The licensee answered the door and
informed me that they were just leaving for appointments and would not be able to complete the inspection today.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
